mapper.insert: insert into basic_country (id, code, abbr, name, en_name, ext1, ext2) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{abbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext2,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update basic_country set code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, abbr = #{abbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, en_name = #{enName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ext1 = #{ext1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ext2 = #{ext2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, code, abbr, name, en_name, ext1, ext2 from basic_country
